title: My english activity log
description: From now on, you will use this article to include every single activity that you do in English in a chronological order (e.g. reading a book in English, watching TV shows and series in English, going to an English Evening in Mons, travelling to an English-speaking country, playing games in English such as the pretty exciting game LyricsTraining, etc.). You can even write a few lines about what you’ve watched/read/done and recommend certain things to your friends. The sky’s the limit! We value personal initiative and we will be happy to read whatever you have to offer.

title: Article 2  :Why Don’t We Hear about More Species Going Extinct?
description: The extinction crisis threatens life all over the planet, but scientists are cautious about declaring a species extinct too quickly

title: Article 1 :IUCN list shows no new extinctions – but they loom large
